channel.title: 317 waaat m8
channel.description:
long story short: when ever someone logs on my server it disconnects them then doesn't let anyone else on.
long story long:
First off, I downloaded uTorrent to portforward port 43594. Secondly I got DUC 3.0 for the DNS kronicrsps.zapto.org. Thirdy I download jdk1.6.0_33 and added it into my system environment variables.
All that is working fine.
I download my RSPS server and run it. When I connect to the server from my client on my computer I can see that I have connected, then I disconnect and the VPS gets the blue screen of death.
I restart it, set everything up, again, servers running, I connect, It says im online, i get disconnected, i cant connect at all, no one can, delete server, re-extract it, run it, connect, get disconnected, can't log on.
This keeps happening and I dont know why? It's really puzzling me.. :hmm: Can anyone please help me

item.title: 317 waaat m8
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

long story short: when ever someone logs on my server it disconnects them then doesn’t let anyone else on.

long story long:

First off, I downloaded uTorrent to portforward port 43594.
Secondly I got DUC 3.0 for the DNS kronicrsps.zapto.org.
Thirdy I download jdk1.6.0_33 and added it into my system environment variables.

All that is working fine.

I download my RSPS server and run it.
When I connect to the server from my client on my computer I can see that I have connected,
then I disconnect and the VPS gets the blue screen of death.

I restart it,
set everything up,
again,
servers running,
I connect,
It says im online,
i get disconnected,
i cant connect at all,
no one can,
delete server,
re-extract it,
run it,
connect,
get disconnected,
can’t log on.

This keeps happening and I dont know why? It’s really puzzling me… :hmm:
Can anyone please help me
